3, Rings in Tunnel

a, The following tolerances apply to each ring relative to its own axis and
position along the tunnel irrespective of its position relative to the designed tunnel
centre line:

Internal Radius                                           £5,0
Plane of leading edge                                       3,0

๒, The as-built position of the centre of the ring shall not depart from the
designed position by more than 75 mm in any direction perpendicular to the axis of
primary นทเทธร,

6 The mean plane of the leading edge of each straight ring shall not vary
from the “correct” plane by more than 5 mm measured at the internal surface of
primary lining, In tunnels driven without shields the “correct” plane shall be
perpendicular to the designed tunnel centre [ทค, In shield-driven tunnels the “correct”
plane shall be perpendicular to the path of the shield ลวร,
